jodd.bean

Class BeanCopy

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.bean.BeanVisitor
      • jodd.bean.BeanVisitorImplBase<BeanCopy>
        • jodd.bean.BeanCopy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InExRuleMatcher<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

    public class BeanCopy
extends BeanVisitorImplBase<BeanCopy>
    Powerful tool for copying properties from one bean into another. BeanCopy works with POJO beans, but also with Map.
    See Also:
    BeanVisitor

      Simple static factory for BeanCopy.
      void copy()

      Defines if all properties should be copied (when set to true) or only public (when set to false, default).

      Defines source, detects a map.

      Creates BeanCopy with given POJO bean as a source.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanCopy

        public BeanCopy(java.lang.Object source,
                java.lang.Object destination)
        Creates new BeanCopy process between the source and the destination. Both source and destination can be a POJO object or a Map.

      • visitProperty

        protected boolean visitProperty(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.Object value)
        Copies single property to the destination. Exceptions are ignored, so copying continues if destination does not have some of the sources properties.
        Specified by:
        visitProperty in class BeanVisitor
